hero.title: MaaEnd
hero.subtitle: MAA - End
hero.tagline: High-precision automation assistant. Designed for heavy-duty operations and maximum efficiency in Arknights: Endfield.

autoSanity.title: Auto Sanity
autoSanity.detail: Automatically recognize stages, optimize efficiency routing, auto-consume recovery items.

infrastructure.title: Smart Infrastructure
infrastructure.detail: Auto mood detection, optimal drone strategy, fully automated shift rotation.

recruitment.title: Recruitment OCR
recruitment.detail: High-precision OCR recognition, auto-calculate optimal tag combinations, never miss a 6-star.

coreEngine.title: Neural Core
coreEngine.detail: Deep learning-based image recognition engine, cross-platform support, millisecond response.

cliApi.title: CLI / API
cliApi.detail: Complete API interface and command-line tools, easily integrate into your workflow.

crossPlatform.title: Cross Platform
crossPlatform.detail: Full platform support: Windows, macOS, Linux, Android.

about.paragraph1: MaaEnd is not just a scriptâ€”it's an intelligent automation platform built on next-generation image recognition technology. Through deep learning models and real-time decision algorithms, it thinks like a human player but with machine-like precision and stability.
about.paragraph2: Open source, secure, and transparent. MaaEnd is community-driven, providing reliable logistical support for millions of administrators worldwide. Whether on high-performance emulators on Windows or Android native environments, MaaEnd delivers a consistently excellent experience.

footer.marquee: LET'S AUTOMATE THE FUTURE OF ARKNIGHTS
footer.description: An advanced AI automation assistant for Endfield. Open source, secure, and highly efficient.
